AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Orphan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were killed by raiders when [PAWN_pronoun] was young. [PAWN_pronoun] is mostly fine nowadays, but sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] suffers from nightmares about that day.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Station Servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents died in the Naki-Empire war, leaving [PAWN_pronoun] with nothing. A Dark Matter researcher took them in as a servant.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Starwatcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_pronoun] loved the stars and would stare at them for hours on end. [PAWN_nameDef] gathered some friends and created their own observatory club squad. They eventually funded their own black hole telescope and used it to discover the secrets of dark matter drawing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Lonely Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always nervous around other Naki, even more so around non-Naki. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up as a lonely child, too afraid to talk to others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Gifted Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the smartest Naki on their station, oftentimes outclassing established researchers in their knowledge. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly rose through the ranks and became an esteemed dark matter scientist.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Wildchild
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent their childhood wandering through ventalation shafts and corridors, looking for adventure and thrills. Sadly, they weren't able to find and defeat the fabled station dragon.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Gamer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't all that interested in studying black holes. Instead, [PAWN_pronoun] grew up playing holo-games, mostly shooters.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Farmkeeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up among the many farming modules of their starbase. Instead of learning about Dark Matter, [PAWN_pronoun] learned about plants and animals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Lazy child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got really tired of everything, so [PAWN_pronoun] just sat in a room and played games day and night. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't care about friends either. As [PAWN_pronoun] didn't wash often, [PAWN_pronoun] room smelled bad too. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were very worried about their child.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Ordinary Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Born in an average middle class family, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up fine, warmly loved by their parents. Sometimes, families do work out on the rim.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Dark Matter researcher before the destruction of the Naki starbases. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered many uses of Dark Matter, including infinite energy sources, weaponry, and space propulsion.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Habitat Maid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a main on the giant Naki starbases. [PAWN_pronoun] did cleaning and prepared meals for the many Naki who lived in space. [PAWN_pronoun] also was in charge of keeping the station clean of trash.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Space Engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained the many starcraft that Naki stations needed to get supplies. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to fix ships with nothing but a bit of scrap plasteel and simple tools.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The destruction of the Naki starbases left few survivors, and [PAWN_nameDef] was one of them. Before being caught and thrown into a black hole by the Empire, [PAWN_nameDef] survived as a renegade rebel fighting the empire where [PAWN_pronoun] could.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Marine
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a trained soldier for the Naki defensive forces. [PAWN_pronoun] was extensively trained in interstellar combat ranging from anti-walker weapons and ship-to-ship combat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Phage Survivor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: At the height of the Naki-Empire war, the Empire engineered a virus to try to wipe out the Naki in their starbases. However, the Naki scientists were able to use volunteers such as [PAWN_nameDef] to engineer a cure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Natural Healer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a natural healing shop in the Naki starbases. Although most Naki used untratech medicine, [PAWN_pronoun] job was to heal the minds and fatigue of those who came to them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Eager Explorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was excited to be released from Omega Eden, and asked the archotech for as much knowledge of the rim as it could provide. [PAWN_pronoun] learned everything there was about survival: food gathering, farming, electricity generation, and building.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Citizen
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary citizen on Naki starbases. Citizens had to work hard every day to support the research operations done on the Omega Eden black hole.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Receptionist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a smart Naki who worked in a bank, in charge of various banking tasks. Though the Naki focused on Dark Matter research, they also took contracts off station from other worlds.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Farmhand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many farmers who worked the starbase's growing quarters. [PAWN_pronoun] worked very hard to feed an entire spacefaring race.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pilot who's able to fly light starcraft. [PAWN_pronoun] often flew patrols to scare off pirates from raiding transports.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Enforcer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an excellent police officer who made sure the starbases ran lawfully. [PAWN_nameDef] was generally lenient on their enforcement of the law, for better or for worse.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Weapons Crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a weapons developer after the destruction of the Naki starbases. [PAWN_pronoun] used the incredible power of the Omega Eden archotech to create powerful weapons to protect the Naki explorers on the Rim.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Missionary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] believed that Dark Matter science could save the universe from destruction. [PAWN_nameDef]'s teachings were rejected by many, so they took on the Explorer role eagerly to spread their teaching on the rim.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Offworld Trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helped find research contracts with planets far away from Naki starbases. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to ensure that enough money was made to keep the starbase running smoothly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Space Controller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a space traffic controller of a Naki starbase. [PAWN_pronoun] controlled the comings and goings of hundreds of starships per day. The job was extremely stressful.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Window Washer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a washer for the Naki starbase's many windows. [PAWN_pronoun] would often go on spacewalks to clean the massive glass domes that served as observatories for the Omega Eden

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Part-timer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Naki who worked part-time at a starbase convenience store. Instead of participating in science, [PAWN_pronoun] sold pre-packaged food and drinks to the stations inhabitants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Entertainer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a moderately successful stand-up comedian on a starbase. [PAWN_pronoun] went on stage every night to tell jokes and anecdotes about space living. Once, [PAWN_pronoun] performed in front of 10,000 people in a large arena.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Research Assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as an assistant to the Dark Matter researchers on Naki starbases. [PAWN_pronoun] would sort paperwork and fill out spreadsheets at the end of a long experiment.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Former Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a chef working in a hotel on the starbase. However, [PAWN_pronoun] was fired after receiving frequent complaints from customers that fur was found in their food.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Animal Handler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] raised livestock in artificial fields on a Naki starbase. [PAWN_nameDef] cared for the many animals [PAWN_pronoun] raised, and eventually opened up a petting zoo.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Astro Miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] went on expeditions to asteroids to mine valuable minerals. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with a large crew to ensure that Naki starbases would always have raw resources to repair and maintain the starbase.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Potter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few potters left in the Naki Republic due to the development of 3D printing technology. [PAWN_pronoun] created works that pursue beauty and value rather than practicality, and these were sold as masterpiece items with high prices.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Hatmaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tailors various hats made with silk. [PAWN_pronoun] went to a distant human country to learn how to tailor hats with traditional methods, and the hats [PAWN_pronoun] tailored became very popular among Nakis. But [PAWN_pronoun] gained painful chronic illness due to mercury poisoning, which was one of the ingredient of the silk, and now lives with anxiety and hand tremors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Watchmaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent a lot of time learning how to make clocks in a human nation. [PAWN_pronoun] gained great popularity among wealthy Nakis since [PAWN_pronoun] carved each piece of watch with delicate handwork and made artistic masterpieces.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Fishmonger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to make delicate dish dishes very well. [PAWN_pronoun] could trim fish neatly with a sharp knife, mix with various sweet and sour sauces, and cook it in a oven or frying pan. The cuisine of [PAWN_nameDef] was so popular that even humans would come from a far, but after the humans closed the border, only the Naki could eat it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Dress Designer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] just got a job as a dress designer after graduated from school. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of making a variety of pretty dresses, but still lacks skill. [PAWN_pronoun] is currently an intern in a studio, but [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of creating their own studio and making dresses under their own name.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Tailor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The oldest city of Naki had several alleys filled with old, small shops. [PAWN_nameDef] had a small tailors. Not only did [PAWN_pronoun] sell fabric and clothes, [PAWN_pronoun] also repaired them with sewing machines and made simple clothes or decorations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Factory Worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] busied herself by assembling electronic parts and picking out defects in the production line of a factory. The income was not that good, but [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard, dreaming of a better life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Lumberjack
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a lumberjack in a dense forest. The work was dangerous, and [PAWN_pronoun] hated physical labor like any other Naki, but [PAWN_pronoun] thought it was cool to swing a giant axe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Poor Roboticist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] studied various mechanoids. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered a few defects while researching discarded mechanoids and put a lot of efforts to resolve them, but there was not much of success. Afterwards, the Republic's funding was cut off, and [PAWN_pronoun] was struggling with a needy life in a small housing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Astronaut
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an experienced astroscientist, and [PAWN_pronoun] trained hard to become one. There are no missions to outer space except sending unmanned probes, but if someone were going to the outer space by a manned spacecraft, she would have been the first.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Mechanic Assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an assistant to starship mechanics. [PAWN_pronoun] originally lacked experience and skill, however [PAWN_pronoun] was able to quickly learn the basics of starcraft maintenance.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Electrician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] crawled through starbase corridors and crawspaces, and replaced electric wires and parts. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to keep balance despite the cramped quarters, but occasionally [PAWN_pronoun] would get shocked by a live wire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Plumber
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s original job was to run water piping through the starbase's internal infrastructure. However, [PAWN_pronoun] made far more money unclogging sinks and showers that stopped working due to furballs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Heavy Industry Technician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Although Naki weren't known for their industry, [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a technician for one of the few Naki companies that manufactured electronics.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Nurse
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a veteran nurse. Even when Naki were seriously wounded in the Empire-Naki war, [PAWN_pronoun] did not panic and carefully treated their wounds.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Astronomer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] analyzed data sent by a deep space probe to create a detailed space map, and calculated the interplanetary flight paths for local starships.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Bioengineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bioengineer studying genetic engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] researched the genes of Naki and found new treatments for diseases. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered that Naki had a genetic makeup that could not occur without artificial gene manipulation, but [PAWN_pronoun] decided to keep it as a secret.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki AI Engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] designed algorithms and mechanoids to assist in Naki research efforts. A lot of their research involved shooting small robots into the event horizon of Omega Eden.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Geologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a geologist who surveyed the surface of black holes. [PAWN_pronoun] discovered several anomalies with Omega Eden's surface, suggesting that matter and data could enter and exit the black hole.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Teacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a starbase school math teacher and a mentor. [PAWN_pronoun] had a busy life teaching many Naki children until they get graduated.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Surgeon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a leading surgeon working in the starbase's medical facilities. Although originally trained for cosmetic procedures, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to treat trauma patients during the Naki-Empire war.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Family Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a public healthcare doctor for Naki famalies. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to keep [PAWN_pronoun] contained to normal cases, however the war pushed [PAWN_pronoun] to accept more troubling injury cases.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Pop Idol
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rare non-scientist Naki who found fame in singing. [PAWN_pronoun] had great dancing skills, outstanding singing skills and an exotic, beautiful appearance that stunned Naki and non-Naki alike.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Bar Singer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a well-known singer who sung at local bars, and released several music albums. Sadly, [PAWN_pronoun]'s career didn't advance much beyond local singing gigs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Space Newscaster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a newscaster for the Naki starbase, and often traveled off station to cover news from other planets. [PAWN_pronoun] would bring back stories of other colonies and civilizations, which astounded the Naki who lived their entire lives in space.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Enlisted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in the Naki Marines. Although the Naki didn't wage war, [PAWN_pronoun] protected the starbase against breach raiders and space pirates.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Naval Marksman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While most Naki would train with rifles, [PAWN_nameDef] trained with naval artillery. Learning how to shoot shipborne weapons translated well to handheld weapons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Offworld Ranger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a marine in charge of protecting Naki who traveled off the station. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn extensive survival skills and fighting techniques to protect their charges.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Infiltrator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After the Empire declared war on the Naki, some volunteered to infiltrate the Empire to sabotage their ships. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to take down several destroyers before being captured, but [PAWN_pronoun] was able to escape.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a medic to save dying fellow soldiers in battlefield. [PAWN_pronoun] honed medical skills to save comrades, but [PAWN_pronoun] soon realised that sometimes Naki have to kill enemies to save allies.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Sergeant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a commanding officer in the Naki Marines. [PAWN_pronoun] was in charge of several combat groups, and led defensive actions in the Empire-Naki war.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Supersoldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Shortly before the Empire began genociding the Naki, several Naki research groups attempted to genetically engineer the perfect Naki supersoldier. [PAWN_pronoun] was one of them, however by the time [PAWN_pronoun] made it to the battlefield, it was too late.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Naval Officer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the many naval officers of the Naki Navy. [PAWN_pronoun] made sure that all of the naval enlisted were trained well, and all starships ran smoothly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Bomber Pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Naki starfighter pilot during the Naki-Empire war. [PAWN_pronoun] used strafing techniques to precisely bomb weakspots in Empire star cruisers, damaging many of them beyond repair.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naki Vigilante
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After the destruction of the Naki starbases, a few remaining Naki swore to exact revenge for the destruction of their species. [PAWN_nameDef] ran guerella operations against the Empire, sabotaging trade routes and bombing ships.
